childMdx.excerpt: That old music, the beat beneath time, taps out this peace, now arriving at the part where you tell me the whole is suspended in  Grace…
One white butterfly floats by beneath the sun's  rainbow  halo as I come back to  salaat , singing of the seam in being both creature and…
The verdict is in, old friend: there will be no recovery.   I am laid  bare on this bright path. The white petals of wind whispered it to me…
